PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ConcreteElementGeneral
PropertySetDef.Definition: General properties common to different types of concrete elements, including reinforced concrete elements. The property set can be used by a number of subtypes of IfcBuildingElement, indicated that such element is designed or constructed using a concrete construction method.

PropertyDef.Name: ConstructionMethod
PropertyDef.Definition: Designator for whether the concrete element is constructed on site or prefabricated. Allowed values are: 'In-Situ' vs 'Precast'.

PropertyDef.Name: StructuralClass
PropertyDef.Definition: The structural class defined for the concrete structure (e.g. '1').

PropertyDef.Name: StrengthClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification of the concrete strength in accordance with the concrete design code which is applied in the project.

PropertyDef.Name: ExposureClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification of exposure to environmental conditions, usually specified in accordance with the concrete design code which is applied in the project.

PropertyDef.Name: ReinforcementVolumeRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The required ratio of the effective mass of the reinforcement to the effective volume of the concrete of a reinforced concrete structural element.

PropertyDef.Name: ReinforcementAreaRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The required ratio of the effective area of the reinforcement to the effective area of the concrete At any section of a reinforced concrete structural element.

PropertyDef.Name: DimensionalAccuracyClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification designation of the dimensional accuracy requirement according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: ConstructionToleranceClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification designation of the on-site construction tolerances according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: ConcreteCover
PropertyDef.Definition: The protective concrete cover at the reinforcing bars according to local building regulations.

PropertyDef.Name: ConcreteCoverAtMainBars
PropertyDef.Definition: The protective concrete cover at the main reinforcing bars according to local building regulations.

PropertyDef.Name: ConcreteCoverAtLinks
PropertyDef.Definition: The protective concrete cover at the reinforcement links according to local building regulations.

PropertyDef.Name: ReinforcementStrengthClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification of the reinforcement strength in accordance with the concrete design code which is applied in the project. The reinforcing strength class often combines strength and ductility.
